org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file
Class FileHandle

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.FileHandle
public class FileHandle
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a handle to a file. Provides methods for creating input and output streams, as well as easy-to-use methods for writing and reading strings from files.

Field Summary
static int BUFFER_SIZE
           
 
Constructor Summary
FileHandle(FileLocation fileLocation)
          Creates a file handle to the given file location.
FileHandle(java.lang.String fileUrl)
          Creates a new file handle with a file url that conforms to the conventions of FileLocation.
 
Method Summary

          Creates an input stream to the file represented by this handle.
 java.io.OutputStream createOutputStream(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
          Creates an output stream to the file represented by this handle.
 java.lang.String readContents(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)

          Writes the contents of the string to the file represented by this handle.

FileHandle

public FileHandle(java.lang.String fileUrl)
           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Creates a new file handle with a file url that conforms to the conventions of FileLocation.

Parameters:
fileUrl - The url to the file
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - If the file url is invalid
See Also:
For more information about file urls

public FileHandle(FileLocation fileLocation)
Creates a file handle to the given file location.

Parameters:
fileLocation - The file location
Method Detail

createInputStream

public java.io.InputStream createInputStream(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             FileException
Creates an input stream to the file represented by this handle. A user object is required in order to obtain the proper security context for accessing the file (i.e. GSSCredenial).

Parameters:
user - The user who is accessing the file
Returns:
The input stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs accessing the file
FileException - For all other errors that occur accessing the file

createOutputStream

public java.io.OutputStream createOutputStream(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               FileException
Creates an output stream to the file represented by this handle. A user object is required in order to obtain the proper security context for accessing the file (i.e. GSSCredenial).

Parameters:
user - The user who is accessing the file
Returns:
The output stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs accessing the file
FileException - For all other errors that occur accessing the file

readContents

public java.lang.String readContents(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     FileException
Reads the contents of the file represented by this handle into a string. A user object is required in order to obtain the proper security context for accessing the file (i.e. GSSCredenial).

Parameters:
user - The user accessing the file
Returns:
The string contents of the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs accessing the file
FileException - For all other errors that occur accessing the file

writeContents

public void writeContents(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                          java.lang.String text)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          FileException
Writes the contents of the string to the file represented by this handle. A user object is required in order to obtain the proper security context for accessing the file (i.e. GSSCredenial).

Parameters:
user - The user accessing the file
text - The string to write to the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs accessing the file
FileException - For all other errors that occur accessing the file

writeToFile

public void writeToFile(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                        java.io.File file)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        FileException
Writes the contents of the file represented by this handle to a local file. A user object is required in order to obtain the proper security context for accessing the file (i.e. GSSCredenial).

Parameters:
user - The user accessing the file
file - The local file to write the contents of the remote file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs accessing the remote or local file
FileException - For all other errors that occur accessing the remote file
